text: Alfredo Bordonali (born December 4, 1919) was an Italian professional football player. He spent one season in the Serie A with A.S. Roma. He also played for B.P.D. Colleferro in Serie C. ==External links== *Profile at Enciclopediadelcalcio.it Category:1919 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:A.S. Roma players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Alfredo Bordonali
